name: Sonic J for ANDROID (Demo)
description:
Sonic J is a Sonic The Hedgehog based Work-In-Progress fan-made game made by jean_tha_n00b (me) and has the purpose of being an unofficial sequel to the classic game,Sonic & Knuckles.

It currently consists of two playable levels which are the Tutorial and Jex Island Act 1, with two playable characters:

Sonic can run at really high speeds which is ideal for fast gameplay but is harder to control. However, Tails runs at slower speeds but is easier to control and has the ability to fly using his two tails. Choose the character that suits you better!

Sonic the Hedgehog is owned by SEGA. I do not own the franchise as I am not affiliated with SEGA and Sonic Team. This is a non-profit fan game and it should not be sold. No copyright infringement is intended by any means.

By the way, if you ever happen to try the game, why not rate it and comment about what you think about it? It would be greatly appreciated
